name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Rudolph V. GARY, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Rudolph V. GARY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order of Superior Court reversed. See Commonwealth v. Browne, 526 Pa. 83, 584 A.2d 902 (1990).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Jeffrey S. Toaltoan, Downingtown, for R.V. Gary.
Mary MacNeil Killinger and Patricia E. Coonahan, Norris-town, for the Com.
casebody.head_matter:
671 A.2d 1129
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Rudolph V. GARY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 22, 1996.
Decided Feb. 13, 1996.
Jeffrey S. Toaltoan, Downingtown, for R.V. Gary.
Mary MacNeil Killinger and Patricia E. Coonahan, Norris-town, for the Com.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
